publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2696 Robin Harper: Cost of Private Finance Initiative Projects—That the Parliament notes with concern that the cost to the taxpayer of Private Finance Initiative projects may increase several fold between the selection of the "preferred bidder" and the signing of the final contract and requests that Her Majesty’s Government withdraw its opposition to the European Union draft directive on consolidated procurement which would ban the selection of preferred bidders before a contract has been developed and prevent inflation of project costs.
S1M-2696 Cost of Private Finance Initiative Projects (lodged on 4 February 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2696 Cost of Private Finance Initiative Projects (lodged on 4 February 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-2696 Robin Harper: Cost of Private Finance Initiative Projects—That the Parliament notes with concern that the cost to the taxpayer of Private Finance Initiative projects may increase several fold between the selection of the "preferred bidder" and the signing of the final contract and requests that Her Majesty’s Government withdraw its opposition to the European Union draft directive on consolidated procurement which would ban the selection of preferred bidders before a contract has been developed and prevent inflation of project costs. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Margo MacDonald, Ms Sandra White, Mr John McAllion*
